name: Mad Armory: Carapace of Chaos
description: The storehouses of the Mad Realm contain many artifacts crafted by the Lunatic Court at their king's behest. Although tales of the Shell of Insanity have spread, its descendant works have remained forgottenâ€”until now.
requirement: Show your allegiance to the Lunatic Court by performing various feats while in a ghostly form from eating certain Halloween foods.
